item.title: The Dark Side Of Metrics
item.description: I have usually been in favor of measurement of any possible aspect of the software development process. Proper techniques of gathering and analyzing metrics have been espoused since Capers Jones created the study of software measurement. I was first introduced to many of these concepts in the writings of Steve McConnell, particularly when his book Rapid Development first came out. If a thing cannot be measured, it cannot be easily studied or improved.
